summary: The Hells Angels is a worldwide motorcycle club with over 6,000 members and chapters in 66 countries. They are known for riding Harley-Davidson bikes and have nicknames like "H.A." and "Red & White." While not all members are involved, many participate in illegal activities like drug trafficking and clashes with rival groups. Due to this, law enforcement agencies often view the Hells Angels as a criminal organization. Despite their controversial reputation, they remain the largest outlaw motorcycle club globally.
title: Hells Angels
